news.title: Indian Army Conducts Joint Military Exercise with US Forces
news.summary: The Indian Army and US Forces successfully conducted a joint military exercise aimed at enhancing interoperability and sharing best practices.
news.content: The two-week long exercise focused on counter-terrorism operations, tactical maneuvers, and sharing of operational experiences. Senior officials from both armies expressed satisfaction with the outcomes.

news.title: New Recruitment Drive Announced for Technical Positions
news.summary: Indian Army announces a nationwide recruitment drive for technical positions including engineering, medical, and IT specialists.
news.content: The recruitment drive will begin next month and will cover 20 major cities. Interested candidates can apply online through the official portal.

careers.title: National Defence Academy
careers.description: Join the prestigious NDA for a career as an officer in the Indian Army. The training includes a rigorous program at NDA followed by IMA.

careers.title: Technical Graduate Course
careers.description: Engineering graduates can join the Indian Army as officers through the Technical Graduate Course, serving in various technical arms and services.
